  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomloose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:sodis.de:MELT-04602300.19</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>DE.FWU</catalog>
            <entry>MELT-04602300.19</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="de">Wechselbeziehungen im Regenwald</string>
            <string language="en">Interdependency in the rainforest</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Interdépendance dans la forêt tropicale</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Interdependência no mais rainforest</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Interdipendenza nel più rainforest</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αλληλεξάρτηση στο τροπικό δάσος</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Interdependencia en el ma's rainforest</string>
          </title>
          <language>de</language>
          <description>
            <string language="de">Alle Organismen im Regenwald sind mehr oder minder von einander abhängig. Einzelne solcher Wechselbeziehungen ergeben sich bei richtiger Zusammenführung von vorgegebenen Begriffen und Beschreibungen.</string>
            <string language="en">All organisms in the rainforest are dependent on each other to varying degrees. To identify these interdependencies, correctly match the terms and descriptions provided.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="de">Tropen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="de">Regenwald</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="de">Symbiose</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Tropics</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Rain forest</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Symbiosis</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <aggregationLevel>
            <source>aggregationLevelValues</source>
            <value>1</value>
          </aggregationLevel>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Toutes les organizations dans la forêt tropicale 
dépendent de l'un l'autre aux degrés variables. Pour 
identifier ces interdépendances, appariez correctement les limites et
les descriptions fournies.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Todos os organismos no mais rainforest são 
dependentes de se aos graus variando. Para identificar estas 
interdependências, combine corretamente os termos e as descrições 
fornecidos.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Tutti gli organismi nel più rainforest dipendono
da a vicenda ai gradi di variazione. Per identificare queste 
interdipendenze, abbini correttamente i termini e le descrizioni 
forniti.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Όλοι οι οργανισμοί στο τροπικό δάσος εξαρτώνται ο 
ένας από τον άλλον σε διαφορετικό βαθμό. Για να 
προσδιορίσετε αυτές τις αλληλεξαρτήσεις, σωστά ταιριάξτε με τους 
όρους και τις περιγραφές παρεχόμενους.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Todos los organismos en el ma's rainforest son 
dependientes en uno a a los grados que varían. Para identificar
estas interdependencias, corresponda con correctamente los términos y
las descripciones proporcionados.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Tropiques</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Forêt tropicale</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Symbiose</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Tropics</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Floresta de chuva</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Symbiosis</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Tropici</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Foresta di pioggia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Simbiosi</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Τροπικοί κύκλοι</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Τροπικό δάσος</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Συμβίωση</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Zonas tropicales</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Selva tropical</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Simbiosis</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
